title: Beats by Dre
description: Beats by Dre is renowned for its vibrant and energetic aesthetic, aligning with the dynamic world of audio products. The brand's colors include vivid hues like passion red (#E31837), elegant violet (#652DB0), and distinctive magenta (#BC1F5D), offering a blend of boldness and modernity. Derived from official brand sources, these colors accentuate its stylish and cutting-edge reputation in the industry.
